summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 7, Green Lake Reservoir Addition, being the alley between 18th Avenue Northeast and 19 Avenue Northeast from East 80th Street to East 82nd Street, and certain other alleys and streets, by paving and otherwise improving the same all in accordance with Resolution No. 15277 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
